name: KeepUpTheBoops
description:
Here's my time-lapse video: https://youtu.be/emSfiSyikJ4

Use the arrow keys to move left and right. Hold L-Shift to speed up.

Keep the ball from hitting the floor or any spikes.

The spikes will be placed randomly when the level reloads.

Try and get the ball into the goal!

Music: Bensound - Cute ... pitched down and played backwards
